subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Serena Williams made 41 errors and was knocked out of the Madrid Masters, falling to Nadia Petrova in the third round, 4-6, 6-2, 6-3.
snippet: Top-ranked Serena Williams made 41 errors and was knocked out of the Madrid Masters, falling to Nadia Petrova in the third round, 4-6, 6-2, 6-3.
